title: A US Bill Would Ban Kids Under 13 From Joining Social Media
description: The legislation would insert the government into online platforms' age-verification efforts—a move that makes some US lawmakers queasy.

title: Microsoft’s Cloud Gaming Dreams Are Falling Apart
description: UK antitrust authorities have blocked its $69 billion deal to acquire Call of Duty publisher Activision Blizzard.

title: Twitter’s Verification Fiasco May End in Court
description: The law says you can’t falsely claim that celebrities are paying for Twitter Blue.

title: An SEC Dissenter Says the Regulator Must Ease Off Crypto
description: The Securities and Exchange Commission has taken a hard line on digital assets. One of its own commissioners says it’s going too far.

title: How Microsoft's Bing Chatbot Came to Be—and Where It's Going Next
description: The AI-powered chat interface transformed the second-place search engine into a trendsetter. Now the company is integrating ads and working on accuracy.

title: Noah Raford Can Help You Prepare for a Not-So-Nice Future
description: We spoke with a futurist to understand the difference between predicting what's coming down the pike and instead being ready for it emotionally.
